thread.title: TOKPOD LAUNCHES CLICK-TO-CALL API FOR DEVELOPERS
thread.title_full: TOKPOD LAUNCHES CLICK-TO-CALL API FOR DEVELOPERS

author: prbuzz.com
title: TOKPOD LAUNCHES CLICK-TO-CALL API FOR DEVELOPERS
text:
San Jose, Ca. October 21st, 2015 . Tokpod today announced the launch of its revolutionary new click to call API that enables developers to add a simple click-to-call button on their websites to help them convert website visitors to phone calls. With just a few lines of code and in less than 5 minutes, any business can place a simple click to call button on their web presence.
Once a website visitors clicks the button, the phone call will start immediately right from the web browser. The service features the world’s first consumer-facing implementation of click-to-call concept. The API comes with a powerful set of analytics to let developers and businesses track their website visitors and phone calls.
Tokpod is built by world’s first entirely web-based B2C communication company letsBrik . With the launch of Tokpod, the company will surface its global VOIP infrastructure and direct carrier relationships into simple, intuitive yet powerful set of VOIP communication related APIs.
“Letting customers or site visitors talk to a sales or support person with a single click of a button – without ever having to leave the website can be a powerful differentiator.” Tokpod CTO, TahirJamil. “This is an entirely new feature that simply does not exist out there.”
All modern web browsers such as Chrome, Firefox and Opera natively support Tokpod. No application or additional plug-ins are needed to enable the feature.
Tokpod targets businesses in a broad range of verticals including e-commerce, travel, education, technology, marketing & financial services.
Free Trial
Developers can integrate Tokpod to their websites at zero upfront cost. There is a 100-minute free trial followed by a subscription based pricing model starting at only $15/month. Tokpod guarantees an instantly positive ROI that can be measured directly by its powerful visitor and phone-call related dashboards.
About Tokpod
Tokpod allows business and developers to add a powerful human-engagement layer to their web-presence without compromising on quality. The company’s platform lets developers integrate world’s first consumer facing click-to-call button in less than 5 minutes.
